common.Records: Records - An array of content which content one to more record
common.CreateTime: CreateTime - Created time for this response data
common.APIUsage-intro: Web service is restful API. Use http POST method. Data format is json

VerifyToken.desc-content:
(POST) 
Verify whether Token is valid or not

WHistory.desc-content:
(POST) 
Query weight history in a time range for certain device
WHistory.example-content:
appId: syVEQA 
token: ab93b852091b7c7afe1908a570ea2d9c 
devicename: B0:41:1D:04:34:5C 
startTime: 2016-01-01 10:03:02 
endTime: 2019-12-12 17:23:06

WHistoryData.Data:
Data - Static data ,example:[value1,time1]@[value2,time2]@...@[valueN,timeN] , @ as separator 
value: weigth value 
time: in milliseconds

SleepRecord.desc-content:
(POST) 
Query sleep record in a time range for certain device
SleepRecord.example-content:
appId: syVEQA 
token: ab93b852091b7c7afe1908a570ea2d9c 
devicename: 20:59:A0:B0:A9:93 
startTime: 2016-01-01 10:03:02 
endTime: 2016-12-12 17:23:06

ProductList.example-content:
appId: syVEQA 
token: ab93b852091b7c7afe1908a570ea2d9c 
filter: [all(all device)],[normal(normal device)], [exception(abnormal device)]

ProductListData.DeviceStatus: DeviceStatus - Device status, refer to DeviceStatus

HelloWorld.desc-content:
(GET) 
To test webservice is working or not

HBHistory.desc-content:
(POST) 
Query heart beat history in a time range for certain device
HBHistory.example-content:
appId: syVEQA 
token: ab93b852091b7c7afe1908a570ea2d9c 
devicename: 20:59:A0:B0:A9:93 
startTime: 2016-01-01 10:03:02 
endTime: 2019-12-12 17:23:06

HBHistoryData.Data:
Data - Statics data ,example:[value1,time1]@[value2,time2]@...@[valueN,timeN] , @ as separator 
value: 
-10000 big movement
-5000 small movement
-3000 unknow 
time: in milliseconds

BRHistory.desc-content:
(POST) 
Query breath rate history in a time range for certain device
BRHistory.example-content:
appId: syVEQA 
token: ab93b852091b7c7afe1908a570ea2d9c 
devicename: 20:59:A0:B0:A9:93 
startTime: 2016-01-01 10:03:02 
endTime: 2019-12-12 17:23:06

BRHistoryData.Data:
Data - Statics data ,example:[value1,time1]@[value2,time2]@...@[valueN,timeN] , @ as separator 
value: value of breath 
time: in milliseconds

BreathArray.desc-content:
(POST) 
Query breath data for certain device
BreathArray.example-content:
appId: syVEQA 
token: ab93b852091b7c7afe1908a570ea2d9c 
devicename: B0:41:1D:04:34:5C

BedRecord.desc-content:
(POST) 
Query on/off bed records in a time range for certain device
BedRecord.example-content:
appId: syVEQA 
token: ab93b852091b7c7afe1908a570ea2d9c 
devicename: 20:59:A0:B0:A9:93 
startTime: 2016-01-01 10:03:02 
endTime: 2019-12-12 17:23:06

BCGArray.desc-content:
(POST) 
Query BCG data for certain device
BCGArray.example-content:
appId: syVEQA 
token: ab93b852091b7c7afe1908a570ea2d9c 
devicename: B0:41:1D:04:34:5C

AlarmList.desc-content:
(POST) 
Query alarm in a time range for certain device
AlarmList.example-content:
appId: syVEQA 
token: ab93b852091b7c7afe1908a570ea2d9c 
devicename: 20:59:A0:B0:A9:93 
startTime: 2017-01-06 10:03:02 
endTime: 2019-12-11 17:23:06

BedRecordType.title: Type:
BedRecordType.offline: offline - Gateway offline lead to off bed

AlarmType.title: Type:
AlarmType.204: 204 - Off bed too long at night

VerifyTokenResponseCode.title: ResponseCode:
VerifyTokenResponseCode.504: 504 - Device does not belong to APPID
